message: I propose a fair 90/10 split, with me getting the larger share.  This is a good starting point, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement quickly.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering we both have an equal say in this. Let's agree on this and avoid further rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I deserve a larger share. Let's split it 70/30. This is my final offer.
